snippet: Plans that limit patients’ choices tend to be cheaper, but there has been concern they will restrict care. A study suggests this concern is overblown.
lead_paragraph: Plans that limit patients’ choices tend to be cheaper, but there has been concern they will restrict care. A study suggests this concern is overblown.

headline.main: Narrow Health Networks: Maybe They’re Not So Bad

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
